references.reason: This paper introduces SECOND, a widely used 3D object detection method based on sparse convolutional neural networks that serves as a baseline for many other methods in the paper.

references.paper_title: VoxelNet: End-to-End Learning for Point Cloud Based 3D Object Detection
references.reason: This paper proposes VoxelNet, a pioneering work in end-to-end 3D object detection from point clouds, which significantly impacted the field and is referenced in multiple other papers cited within this paper.

references.paper_title: PointPillars: Fast Encoders for Object Detection from Point Clouds
references.reason: This paper introduces PointPillars, a highly efficient and effective 3D object detection method that significantly improved the speed and performance of 3D object detection.
This paper proposes a center-based approach to 3D object detection and tracking, which is a significant advancement over previous methods and improves accuracy and efficiency.

references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper introduces the nuScenes dataset, a large-scale, multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving that has become a standard benchmark for evaluating 3D object detection models, and its class imbalance is directly addressed in this paper.
